Negative_Review: The room is small view on garbage As an spg member didn t expect that They didn t suggest for a club room
Positive_Review: Nice reception area buffet breakfast very nice competent staff

Negative_Review: Rooms and bathrooms a little small
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast offerings each day full English and Continental Executive Lounge offers excellent additional options especially if in a group

Negative_Review: The Starbucks employee charged a service on the take away coffees each time my daughters ordered from them Felt the young lady was trying to make extra money off my teenagers checked at other Starbucks and they never charge extra for a takeaway order very unhappy about that
Positive_Review: Loved the size of the room for myself and my teenage daughters Bathroom very clean and functional Room wasnt ready on arrival but the pleasant young receptionist gave us access to the private lounge to wait in

Negative_Review: We were very displeased that wifi in rooms was not complimentary As a result we did not pay and needed to be in the lounge to make plans and check emails This is the only hotel of many that we have stayed in recently that had such inconvenient wifi We thought the hotel would give better complimentary service
Positive_Review: Location close to the Gloucester tube station

Negative_Review: It was ridiculously hot and we were unable to sleep well Also there weren t any full size towels provided We were only given what appeared to be hand towels It was bizarre
Positive_Review: It was convenient to the tube

Negative_Review: Man the cleaners drove me crazy early every morning banging in and out of rooms ignoring that they can actually close a door with the handle so is would be quieter They disregard that guests are trying to sleep It is seems they have the attitude of I am at work so you all should be
Positive_Review: I stayed for a week and it was home from home good size room with full amenities and very comfortable bed

Negative_Review: Overhead Air conditioning unit in the bedroom a little intrusive when trying to sleep
Positive_Review: Location is perfect 7 minute walk from Gloucester Road Underground 42 minutes on the Piccadilly Line T5 LHR to Gloucester Road Station Excellent position for everything Great staff here 9 minutes on foot to the History Museum 20 mins on foot to Harrods Great restaurants in the vicinity Child friendly hotel and staff Breakfast superb Will stay again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The executive lounge has the best coffee anywhere Also very convenient to pop in for a water or cookie before heading out or upon arriving back after a long day Very nice people as well

Negative_Review: The car park which was small
Positive_Review: Everthing we got upgraded for free and access to the lounge which was great fun Bed was nice to sleep in checked in and out without any problems

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The receptionist who checked us in on Friday 21 April at 3pm was absolutely wonderful and she remembered us throughout our stay She is a lovely person and very welcoming and helpful However that said all the staff are wonderful welcoming polite and very helpful Thank you for your hospitality

Negative_Review: Only 1 lift working long periods of time waiting for lift was not told a deposit was due even when you leave a pre payment debit card paid cash for deposit still not refunded yet
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Wouldn t stay in room 131 again noise from heating generator coming from glass roof buildingwas very disturbing although did get used to it second night The glass roof was just under the window so poor view Would stay again just in different room
Positive_Review: The staff especially concierge and in the bar area All were excellent very welcoming polite with nothing too much trouble Efficient check in out

Negative_Review: I had a no smoking room but other guests on the same floor had been smoking cigars so it smelled awful There was a drunken fight in the corridor between a large group of men between the hours of 3 5 am which disrupted our sleep as you can imagine Hotel did nothing to compensate our dissatisfaction Received an insincere apology from the guests involved and reception Considering the cost to stay in this hotel per night it was incredibly disappointing
Positive_Review: The location was very good

Negative_Review: Only basic selection of tea and coffee in rooms Disappointing that wifi is not free throughout the hotel
Positive_Review: Good location Large pleasant room very comfortable beds and helpful staff

Negative_Review: The only negative I had was that while the wifi was free in all the public areas it came at a cost of 10 per day for room access As along with most people in today s world I use internet as an integral part of life it was an extra cost that I hadnt expected
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful genuinely solicitous and provided a personal touch which is sadly lacking in so many hotels at this time It made such a difference I felt that I was more than just another face I actually felt welcome Our booking included both breakfast and use of the executive lounge which was a haven of peace It also supplied constant beverages Our room was very well appointed with immaculate linen and a towelling dressing gown The furnishings were of a high standard and very comfortable The breakfast was truly excellent both in choice and quality The coffee came in generously sized individual pots and was very good I love my coffee in the morning and it didn t disappoint My only regret was that I didnt have the opportunity to avail of the excellent on site gym

Negative_Review: the decoration and the bathroom need a refurb A bit dated but clean
Positive_Review: Good location nice hotel facilities the room was dated although the bed was lovely with nice sheets and the TV was nice very clean

Negative_Review: But we are on the 8th floor top floor and the windows have gaps and strong winds blew into the room very cold in particular we have one bed next to the window The food in the restaurant is okay but not up to a four star hotel standard My son s fish fingers were under cooked
Positive_Review: The room is quite spacious which I like

Negative_Review: Just very Expensive one night with a Meal drinks for my family of 4 was over 500 It is noted at Parking on site but this is 35 a day too as I was there for a day 4 hours spent 50 extra on Parking at the Hotel just took the edge off
Positive_Review: Excellent Hotel the Staff are what made the Hotel an even better experience

Negative_Review: Walls between rooms quite thin Loud conversations between guests in a neighbouring room kept us awake one night
Positive_Review: The breakfast was great lots of fresh fruit and healthy options Staff very welcoming and helpful Room very clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Only one lift working during our stay
Positive_Review: Staff was great with our young children After arriving soaking wet from our walk from the metro staff got our boys hot chocolate and settled down before checking us in Good breakfast spread Easy access to public transport

Negative_Review: The Conciergerie service is not so good The responsibles do not provide good information and are not weel informed about London attractions
Positive_Review: The breakfast is great and look for Rob he is brazilian and the best waiter at the restaurant Also he can gives you excelent advices about things to do in London

Negative_Review: The accommodation seems a refurbished older building and the old look and feel still isn t superb not the way we know Marriott
Positive_Review: The location on Cromwell Rd in Kensington Hyde Park and near Gloucester Underground and main museums Staff is absolutely helpful

Negative_Review: Gym did not open on Sunday Morning A noise fan in the ceeling could not be switched off Cupboards next to the bed are too high so one could bump one s head
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The breakfast was too expensive at 20 each much cheaper to go out a short walk to a cafe Also a fair walk from the tube
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly enough

Negative_Review: We were a family of four but the room was only set up for two people It wouls have been better if we hadn t had to ask for the extra towels and stuff The breakfast bacon was too crispy
Positive_Review: WE only stayed one night but the bed was really comfy and I ve been converted to feather pillows

Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: The room was spacious clean and warm The staff were extremely helpful and polite The location was absolutely perfect walking distance to harrods and the national history museum

Negative_Review: Our rooms were in the converted Premier Inn part of the hotel We looked out on a brick wall Our friends also had a poor view Rooms were very small the beds weren t the usual Marriott standard Felt we had been given sub standard rooms because we had got them at a cheap rate We have stayed before and the rooms have been lovely We were embarrassed to have recommended the hotel to our friends We were away for a celebration weekend and the rooms spoilt it
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast

Negative_Review: Lack of basic ventilation Comfortable enough but very tired Overpriced room and services such as breakfast or even coffee
Positive_Review: Some of the staff were lovely others not so

Negative_Review: Room on groundfloor cold and dark Wagen asked whether they had another room available that will cost you 90 more per night No interest in customers
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Breakfast Having to wait 40 min for a breakfast order after having spoken to two different waitresses about it is absolutely unacceptable Concierge The concierge arranged a car service for us in order to get to Euston Station in good time to catch our train on the morning we departed Prior to getting into the vehicle the Concierge confirmed that our 2 bags that had previously been left with the Concierge while we ate breakfast had been loaded into the car Needless to say we were angry and extremely disappointed to arrive at Euston station and find that our bags had not travelled with us They were still at the hotel When we called the hotel about this issue the Concierge proceeded to argue with us about it and basically called us liars As a result of the ineptitude of the Concierge and the missinformation we missed our originally scheduled departure time with Virgin and we were required to purchase two new tickets at a cost of 150 This disappointing end to our stay in London caused us to miss a very important appointment later the same day
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: I would have loved if the Lounge was located in an area with windows and not in a cellar type closed off room
Positive_Review: Great location with Subway access within acceptable distance A quick stroll to Hyde Park and Royal Albert Hall also makes this a great place to stay if you are in London for music like we were

Negative_Review: Limited restaurant menu for vegetarians
Positive_Review: Modern clean rooms great to have a bath lively atmospheric bar great location not far from the tube station convenient location opposite Sainsburys and close to many restaurants Excellent efficient service from staff at front desk both on check in and check out

Negative_Review: Charges for WiFi Thin walls so very noisy Rooms relatively small for 4 star Hot rooms with extremely noisy air conditioning
Positive_Review: Good breakfast choice Friendly staff

Negative_Review: INADEQUATE PARKING ONLY ABOUT 10 SPACES FOR ENTIRE HOTEL THERE WAS A FIRE ALARM ACTIVATION AT 01 40 STAFF DID NOT KNOW WHAT TO DO THERE WAS NO FLOOR BY FLOOR CLEARANCE OF QUESTS WHILE WE WERE WAITING FOR THE ALL CLEAR I SAW QUESTS WERE STILL IN THEIR ROOMS LOOKING OUT OF THE WINDOWS ONCE WE WERE ALLOWED BACK IN THE HOTEL THERE WAS NO EXPLANATION NO APOLOGY OR ANY SORT OF RECOMPENSE OFFERED 4 STAR HOTEL DEFINITELY NOT
Positive_Review: BED AND LOCATION

Negative_Review: Hotel style is a bit old but it s still nice
Positive_Review: Staff are very very very helpful and kind cleaning service is the best the location is great the price is good

Negative_Review: Clealiness of the room upon arrival was not up to expected standard as toilet was not cleaned properly and not flushed
Positive_Review: Special Occassion Visit to london to celebrate engagement Hotel Staff greated us with a gift of Wine and Fruit platter which was very nice of them

Negative_Review: 10 charge for wifi that was levied whiled using phone in the bar Was told public areas were free wifi Surly receptionist added fuel to fire Not a good CX for an international brand
Positive_Review: Location was good and facilities good

Negative_Review: One of the cleaner woman came to knock my door and disturb me at 10 30 am asking me when I was leaving so rude I mentioned the same morning at reception I would checkout at 12 00 pm I felt really up set and reported it to Andrea at reception she did not care did not even apologies just moved on to the next customer I felt completely neglected and ignored I definitely not recommend this hotel very poor standard and customer service In addition to that my room was so small very bad view Very bad energy in this place
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The staff weren t very helpful or overly friendly The hotel room was a bit on the dingy side though I think it is in the process of renovating
Positive_Review: The location was pretty good walking distance to Kensington Palace and Hyde Park a few minutes walk to the tube

Negative_Review: Breakfast area cramped expensive and not particularly good Better value and service in local cafes
Positive_Review: excellent room helpful staff within walking distance of many attractions a comfortable stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were more than helpful We d done the moonwalk and late back to the hotel We asked for a late checkout and was given until 2pm with no hassle So helpful and I would definitely come back and recommend the hotel Thank you

Negative_Review: We didn t like being woken during the night by the security asking us to turn our TV off when it was already off and the strange buzzing noises on and off all night in our room Service in the bar was poor
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The drinks prices very dear no mention of service charge had to ring recep for bath towels had to wait 90 mins to get a car parkin space as no where else to park which resulted in a late meeting
Positive_Review: The bar staff were excellent the reception quick check in an check out

Negative_Review: Just the wall art
Positive_Review: Staff were great room was clean but decor was a little dated but maybe just not my taste Rate was ok for london i guess but perhaps a little much for the room size etc if compared to others

Negative_Review: More choice for cooked Buffet no fried bread or black pudding I paid 215 asked for a high room mentioned it was my birthday Both were ignored Poor choice of 24hr room service Uht milk with tea making is very yuk
Positive_Review: Room clean comfy Good nights sleep

Negative_Review: Drinks in the bar were over priced 20 25 for a vodka and lemonade and a small white wine spritzer
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and knowledgable we were able to book our tours from the concierge and we were allowed into our room at 11 30am when we arrived

Negative_Review: They only provide one bottle of each of the shampoo shower wash etc They said you could ask but I feel with two people staying in the room there should be two of everything Not enough cushions on the bed so you could prop yourself up to watch the tv or just to drink your morning coffee in bed
Positive_Review: The location was good for what we were doing the next day Staff friendly and the room was clean

Negative_Review: As stated the noise and disruption of the underground which appeared to go right under our room until at least midnight and resumed at about 5 30am
Positive_Review: The bed was good and the breakfast was excellent as good as any five star Hotels we have stayed at We also enjoyed the bar area and the staff were very good

Negative_Review: Having to pay 50 extra to get what I had originally asked for on the first booking form I had filled in which was two single beds in the room When we first went to reception the first person we saw said the room was a double room and there were no rooms with two singles available but they would see what they could arrange After a couple of hours nothing had happened so I approached reception again and at this point another person was extremely helpful and said there was a room with two singles but at a cost of 50 extra so we decided to up grade and thanked this person for their help in sorting our dilemma
Positive_Review: The room had all we needed for a comfortable stay eventually

Negative_Review: Manageress attitude was atrocious if it wasn t for fact at conference there at 8 in morning would have walked out will never stay there again in process of complaining about attitude and rooms given as not as described on booking
Positive_Review: Only one thing an assistant offered help and went above and beyond on when I was leaving only thing I have anything good to say about stay

Negative_Review: The discretionary service charge on the bar drinks automatically added to the bill
Positive_Review: Excellent location a short walk from the tube at Earls Court Within walking distance of the Natural History Science V A museums Very accommodating with our early check in request and EXCELLENT breakfast included amazing pancakes made to order Nice quiet room with the sqidgyish pillows ever

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had an excellent experience The staff was warm kind and very helpful From Ali and Alex at the concierge desk to Erol and Ali at breakfast to Victor up front We had to leave early on our last day and the manager had the executive lounge opened so we could eat breakfast before 6 am Class act

Negative_Review: Dirty towels in room small room not quite deluxe as described when booking Unable to change to a better room without paying 75 pound more Used this hotel for ten years has gone down hill
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Two mornings we had breakfast in the hotel the first morning I had to wait for my breakfast I ordered the second morning was longer so I cancelled and left without eating any breakfast Can t believe that a hotel of this size only had one chef cooking food
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly in bar at night and on reception

Negative_Review: This is a general point i noted in many hotels the TV doesn t include the football of premier league Otherwise every thing is very good especially the staff
Positive_Review: Overall very good stay and very helpful staff

Negative_Review: Having to leave a deposit or credit card for extras Also being charged a service fee for ordering a sandwich in the bar after 11pm which could not be paid in cash but deducted from the deposit without being advised of such a charge

Positive_Review: staff try really hard very friendly but also feels they are under a lot of pressure from management

Negative_Review: Rooms are not good value for what you pay quite small and you can hear everything Bathroom looks very dated

Negative_Review: The room is very small it has no window to open so you can t get fresh air from outside In my room it was a leak under the carpet a pipe I think has broken and it was a very bad smell due to all that water on the carpet and since I couldn t open the window you can imagine the smell
Positive_Review: I liked the breakfast it was very rich and very good and the location of the hotel

Negative_Review: A little bit old fashioned demonstration but the room is very clean
Positive_Review: The Location is great staffs r friendly and helpful We booked the family room and very luckily got the room on seventh floor and the beds r very comfy Housekeeping cleaned our room well and sent us some spring water free of charge And I like the hot chocolate served in our room Btw my family love our room a lot especially for its large space with a good value

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Clean and airy hotel with a good atmosphere smiley staff and a reasonably large standard room for both price and close to central London location Room service prompt and efficient breakfast had plenty of variety and was efficient and well executed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: You have a car park and you are very handy for Harrods and trains to the West End We come down for Christmas shopping each year and always stay with you

Negative_Review: When I first arrived the lady at the reception told me that she was not sure if breakfast was included in the room rate because she had lost connection with booking com I showed her my copy of the reservation she said that it was mostly written in Greek she couldn t read it She was rude and ironic Although I had asked for a quiet room in upper stores the gave me room 224 at the end of a corridor near the place where staff was working gathering towels etc the noises were terrible Doors opened and closed several times Also the noise from tv in the room attached to mine was terrible and made me call the reception to send someone to that room The most terrible unbearable noise came from the Aircondition of my room The view from my room was horrible I attach pictures When I told the receptionist that the room was very small she told me That I had paid for a standard room But I am not sure at all that the non refundable price I paid in August was for a standard room I chosed a superior room I have reserved many hotels through booking com and is the first time that people of the reception had no idea about my reservation
Positive_Review: The restaurant and the bar

Negative_Review: Room faced the back of adjacent buildings very poor lighting near the desk
